io.confluent.ksql.metastore.model

Interface DataSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KsqlStream, KsqlTable

    public interface DataSource

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        SourceName getName()
        Returns:
        the name of the data source.

      • getDataSourceType

        DataSource.DataSourceType getDataSourceType()
        Returns:
        the type of the data source.

      • getSchema

        LogicalSchema getSchema()
        Get the logical schema of the source.

        The logical schema is the schema used by KSQL when building queries.

        Returns:
        the physical schema.

      • getKsqlTopic

        KsqlTopic getKsqlTopic()
        Returns:
        the topic backing the source.

      • getTimestampColumn

        java.util.Optional<TimestampColumn> getTimestampColumn()
        The timestamp extraction policy of the source.

        This is controlled by the CommonCreateConfigs.TIMESTAMP_NAME_PROPERTY and CommonCreateConfigs.TIMESTAMP_FORMAT_PROPERTY properties set in the WITH clause.

        Returns:
        the timestamp extraction policy of the source.

      • getKafkaTopicName

        java.lang.String getKafkaTopicName()
        Returns:
        the name of the KAFKA topic backing this source.

      • getSqlExpression

        java.lang.String getSqlExpression()
        Returns:
        the SQL statement used to create this source.

      • isCasTarget

        boolean isCasTarget()
        Returns:
        returns whether this stream/table was created by a C(T|S)AS

      • canUpgradeTo

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> canUpgradeTo(DataSource other)
        Parameters:
        other - the other data source
        Returns:
        an optional, empty if compatible or an explanation if incompatible

      • with

        DataSource with(java.lang.String sql,
                LogicalSchema schema)
        Parameters:
        sql - a sql statement to append to the current sql
        schema - a schema
        Returns:
        a new DataSource object with all attributes the same as this, but with a new schema
